Query.SQL: SELECT /*+ INDEX_FFS(IDX_SESSION_HIS_01) */ DISTINCT CONSUMER_NAME FROM SESSION_HISTORY ORDER BY CONSUMER_NAME
SELECT /*+ INDEX_FFS(IDX_SESSION_HIS_01) */ DISTINCT APP_NAME FROM SESSION_HISTORY ORDER BY APP_NAME
SELECT /*+ INDEX_FFS(IDX_SESSION_HIS_02) */ DISTINCT CLUSTER_NAME FROM SESSION_HISTORY ORDER BY CLUSTER_NAME

(SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,'Submitted' AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME,'yyyy/mm/ddhh24'),'yyyy/mm/ddhh24') AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (CREATE_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND CREATE_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp1 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) UNION ALL (SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,'Finished' AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(END_TIME,'yyyy/mm/ddhh24'),'yyyy/mm/ddhh24') AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (END_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND END_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp2 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) ORDER BY TIME_STAMP, STATE_SESSION DESC

(SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,'Submitted' AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS DATETIME) AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (CREATE_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND CREATE_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp1 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) UNION ALL (SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,'Finished' AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(END_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS DATETIME) AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (END_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND END_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp2 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) ORDER BY TIME_STAMP, STATE_SESSION DESC

(SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,CAST('Submitted' AS VARCHAR(26)) AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT TIMESTAMP(DATE(CREATE_TIME),SUBSTR(CHAR(TIME(CREATE_TIME)), 1, 3)||'00:00') AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (CREATE_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND CREATE_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp1 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) UNION ALL (SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,CAST('Finished' AS VARCHAR(26)) AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT TIMESTAMP(DATE(END_TIME),SUBSTR(CHAR(TIME(END_TIME)), 1, 3)||'00:00') AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (END_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND END_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp2 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) ORDER BY TIME_STAMP, STATE_SESSION DESC

(SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,'Submitted' AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, TIME_STAMP, 120), 1, 13) + ':00:00', 120) AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (CREATE_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND CREATE_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp1 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) UNION ALL (SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,'Finished' AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, TIME_STAMP, 120), 1, 13) + ':00:00', 120) AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (END_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND END_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp2 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) ORDER BY TIME_STAMP, STATE_SESSION DESC

(SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,CAST('Submitted' AS VARCHAR(26)) AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CREATE_TIME,'yyyy/mm/ddhh24'),'yyyy/mm/ddhh24') AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (CREATE_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND CREATE_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp1 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) UNION ALL (SELECT TIME_STAMP,COUNT(*) AS NUM_SESSION,CAST('Finished' AS VARCHAR(26)) AS STATE_SESSION FROM (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(END_TIME,'yyyy/mm/ddhh24'),'yyyy/mm/ddhh24') AS TIME_STAMP FROM SESSION_HISTORY WHERE (END_TIME >= %%%StartTime%%% AND END_TIME< %%%EndTime%%%) AND CLUSTER_NAME IN (%%%CLUSTER%%%) AND (%%%CONDITION_NAME%%% = %%%CONDITION_VALUE%%%) ) temp2 GROUP BY TIME_STAMP ) ORDER BY TIME_STAMP, STATE_SESSION DESC
